name: Talk Morrissey 2
_source: speak;Morrissey;Simon, you seem tired.{w}{br}Were the chambers not to your liking?
speak;Simon;No, the rooms were more than fine.{w}{br}I just had some trouble sleeping.

speak;Morrissey;Please, you simply must take your mind off of this.{w}{br}Why don't you join my daughter Anuki in a skirmish against my guard captain?{w}{br}I would value the chance to see your tactics and swordsmanship in practice.

s;Morrissey;I've considered your request.{w}{br}I do believe our houses would be stronger together than apart.{w}{br}And a union between yourself and Anuki would certainly be one way to forge a strong alliance.
s;Morrissey;But I only ask that you think on this.
s;Simon;Uh, of course. {w}I'll give it some thought.
speak;Morrissey;The training grounds are on the west side of the main hall.{w}{br}We'll talk more after you clear your head.
